body.name: IRONCK Industrial Bookcases and Bookshelves, 5-Tiers Corner Bookcase with Curved Panels, L Shaped Shelf with Metal Frame for Open Storage for Living Room Home Office
features: 【L-Shape Design】Measuring 68.7"H x 42.7"D x 42.7"W, this L-shaped corner bookshelf perfectly fits the wall, making full use of the limited corner space and saving more space in your room.

【5-Tier Open Storage】This bookshelf offers not only ten open shelves but also four additional curved panels that greatly increase display and storage space while keeping your daily essentials organized.

【Sturdy and durable】Constructed from MDF and a metal frame, this bookcase ensures stability and increased load capacity, with a load capacity of 88 lbs per shelf. The addition of two metal X-frame crossbars at the back also enhances the stability of the product.
【Easy clean-up】The material of this bookcase is powder-coated, making it waterproof and scratch-resistant. It is also very easy to clean, requiring only a damp cloth during daily cleaning.
【Easy to Assemble】Comes with detailed instructions and necessary hardware, and each accessory is labeled for easy installation. It is recommended to have two people for assembly.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 Living Room 2 Home Office

5Tiers Corner Bookcase with Curved Panel Unique Structure and Charming Industrial Style Combining the industrial look of steel with the warmth of wood, this bookcase offers a modern style. Additionally, its multiple shelves provide versatile decorating options. The industrial look of this bookcase complements your home decor, allowing you to mix and match to create your perfect room.

L Shaped Shelf with Metal Frame Space-saving and Convenient to Use With its industrial appearance and functional design, this corner shelf stand is suitable for any room and always comes into full play. It can be used as a bookshelf, plant stand, display shelf, or corner bookcase in the home office, or as a display console anywhere you desire.

MDF Board and Metal Frame The combination of MDF board and metal frame makes the entire shelf more robust and durable. 2 Metal X-frame Crossbar The two metal X-frame crossbars ensure that the shelf is stable and does not shake, in addition to preventing items from falling. Anti-tipping kit Supplied with 2 anti-tip kits, please use them once you have assembled the shelf to ensure the safety of your family. Adjustable Feet The feet are adjustable so that the shelf can remain stable on uneven ground and will not scratch your floor.
Material MDF Board+Metal Frame Size 42.7"D x 42.7"W x 68.7"H Color Vintage Brown Weight Capacity 88 lbs/shelf

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I gave this a 5 star overall, but a 3 star for the directions. We had a few "oops" moments where we realized that the posts were facing the wrong way. Otherwise, this bookshelf is perfect. It is sturdy, all of the pieces went together and it looks absolutely beautiful. The box arrived in a little bit of "rough" condition, but that's not a surprise during the holidays. The pieces were so well packed inside, that there wasn't a dent or scratch on anything. I would buy this again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Heavy duty shelving. Looks great and has lots of room. Had a little trouble assembling it, but that was my failure. Didn’t pay attention to the direction I had turned the pieces and had to take some off and turn the around. Overall it’s a winner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Modern, sturdy, easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: Boy does this bookcase have a lot more shelf space than it appears. Was relatively easy to assemble. Looks modern with a classic feel. I purchased a second one to fit in the other corner of my entertainment room. Great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy Bookcase with Great Configuration
reviews.reviewText: I bought this bookcase after doing some research across various options, decided to share my thoughts below.Positives:Very sturdy - pretty sure barring you putting your full weight on this once fully assembled, it won't topple over under normal circumstances.Great L Shape with a ton of shelf options including corner shelves between the normal shelf levels (very unique and really useful).Each part was clearly labeled for assembly purposes for the instructions.Negatives (and these aren't very bad):The wood pictured on the product sales page is not the color you get; it is far darker brown (some of the pictures in the reviews actually show it much better for what you will get). They probably used a high contrast set of images for the product page, just be aware this isn't a light or medium brown set of shelves with blackened rings, it is dark brown with blackened rings. Honestly this was the only reason I took off 1 star, would have preferred the color in the product's images as shown, but it's not a major issue for my area either.The packaging styrofoam does keep the items pretty well protected in shipping. After saying that part and maybe I'm unlucky here, it kind of exploded into little bits and attached itself to nearly every shelf and metal bar. It's a ton of cleanup while removing it from the box and assembling the bookcase.The shelves aren't 100% perfectly drilled or aligned when assembling the bookcase. 3 of the 5 shelves when they meet at the L joint have small gaps or are slightly angled (can even see the dowels in one case with the gap). This probably was a manufacturing issue or machining problem with the holes that were drilled in the assembly - it's wood so this stuff happens. The gaps are quite small, and I doubt much would be able to fall through accidentally but it's still worth noting.The instructions for the assembly while pretty easy to follow aren't great for the shelf assembly when you insert them so that the dowel holes face each other - be mindful of that when you're doing those steps because the other holes are basically symmetrical for the connections to the metal frame and you might not notice it at first (you don't want to screw them in the wrong order and undo it to correct later). Entirely reliant on allen wrench assembly (can be good and bad, some of the screws could easily have been made for a phillips-head screwdriver instead but just weren't). Also, when tightening some of the screws on the bottom of the shelves, the plastic inserts don't always tighten properly and just spin in their holes at a certain point, not from over-tightening but just not fully secured in the wood to prevent that from happening (again it's probably a machining issue during manufacturing).Overall:Very satisfied so far with the bookcase and it looks nice while being quite stable (not concerned about leveling issues or it falling over). If you're looking for an open back L shaped bookcase this is a pretty good one and the price is very reasonable even with the small shipping fee.Hope this helps folks looking for something that fits their bookcase search.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are great shelves and they feel very sturdy. I have struggled to find shelves that will actually support heavy books and so far they are holding up really well. My husband and I put these together in under an hour. We were impressed with how well the pieces fit together and everything lined up. I will definitely be buying more shelves from this company!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was exactly what I needed for my dining room corner! It holds a large amount of heavy cookbooks, serving bowls and baskets. It was easy to assemble; I did most of it by myself. I only needed an extra set of hands for assembling the two sides together. It fits flush in a corner, so it saves space and adds valuable space at the same time. I'm very pleased with this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Lack of instructions.
reviews.reviewText: We love the shelving unit it was just a little difficult to assemble because of the missing instructions. The instructions went from step 2 to step 12 leaving a person to fill in the gap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and large for the price.
reviews.reviewText: It’s a great size and very sturdy. Took about 30 minutes for my fiancé and I to put together.
